FireStrike arrived back where Megatron was.  "Can't take care of him 
yourself Megatron. You need him, (menasor), to do it for you.  This, 
is why I show no faith in you anymore.  I am starting a vote of non-
confidence.  IS THERE ANYONE THAT IS NOT COWARDNESS ENOUGH TO SECOND 
IT?" he questioned all around him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron looked at Slaughter, only the side of his face that was 
ruined
> could be seen. Meshes of wire overlapped some remaining armour. 
Some of
> the endoskelleton structure moved, as it would when he smiled. 
> "If just to please my new alliance." Megatron laughed, then looked 
at
> Slaughter. "If you have anything valuable to say about who you once
> were, say it now, before Menasor relieves you off your head." 
Megatron
> said Bluntly.
> 
> At this Menasor understood. He brought his other hand overtop, and
> closed it around Slaughter's head, a hand capable of excerting over 
100
> tons per square inch of pressurs, and waiting for the word. He hand
> engulfed the top of Slaughter's head.
